ModMetaData.name: Expanded Shells
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds artillery shells in keeping with vanilla that are in between existing shells.
 For the moment, three shells are added: 
 a "Very High Explosive Shell," which has the same damage stats as the High Explosive Shell but has a larger blast radius,
 a "Heavy Firefoam Shell," which again spreads firefoam over a larger area, and 
 a "Soap Shell," which removes filth in a large area around the shell. 

Credit to prism's MortarManiac and Noodles' More Psycasts for some extremely useful code. 

Version 1.0.0 
For version 1.3.
